game_name: Oculus Hand Gameplay Showcase for Unreal
game_description: This demo contains reusable components for many robust hand tracking mechanics.
review_1: I got bored after playing with all the things for a while, but it would be cool for multiplayer or a new map or more Devices. Other than that it is a awesome testðŸ˜€
review_2: ...but you'd think there would be more exciting examples of the technology, because it's from oculus.
review_3: This is probably the best hands tracking demonstration outside of the official Oculus demo Elixir. Very robust mechanics that actually work and make hands interactions seem effortless. A solid recommendation.
review_4: Cool hand tracking for unreal demo
